text: I just took a moment to count my blessings‚Äîhow wonderful it is to have a church right below my workplace, Frasers Tower. Although I am member from another church, these Cross and God's Word on the wall serve as constant reminders of God‚Äôs nearness and presence in my daily life.
Church with interesting facade. Currently closed for a revamp.
Historic Church being restored. A space craved out for God in the midst of a busy city.
The post colonial chinese style building does not have any symbol of a church.

I did not enter the church, only admired the building from the outside.

Restored building in the CBD housing a church established in 1889.

It's amazing how the areas immediately around it is redeveloped while maintaining the integrity of buildings like these which are more than a century old! In this case, there are new buildings all around, and of course the MRT system underground.

The ingenuity of humans! Engineers are so essential in making lives easier, but are usually unnoticed üëçüèº
